column1: English Sent: We will learn more about major physical features of India and how they have been formed.
Hindi Tansl: aba hama BArawa_kI_muKya BU-AkqwiyoM kI viSeRawAeMz waWA unakI saMracanA ke bAre meM jAneMge.
Anu Translation:  hama BArawa ke muKya BOwika_wawva aiSeRawAeM Ora ke_bAre_meM viswAra sIKeMge ve kEse banAe gaye hEM
